name: Sleepless Nights
description: Sleepless Nights is a first person atmospheric adventure game. The player experiences the journey that the main character (Mallory) goes through. Mainly set in her bedroom, and also her fears and insecurities that the character has in the form of nightmares/bad dreams. The game is focused mainly on the narrative, and to invoke emotions in the player. As nightmares in the forms of levels are completed/defeated, Mallorys room will become more colourful, or more detailed, moving from a dull monochromatic/blue sadness to a bright and colourful mood as she fights her demons.
